events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the product as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized as a refund issue due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah M. for further handling and communication.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also send a photo of the item you received and its packaging? This will help us speed up your refund.
Sure, my order number is 4589123. I have attached photos showing the product does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund offer. I look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund request has been approved and initiated. The case is now considered resolved from our side.
Just following up to make sure you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Yes, the refund was received yesterday. Thank you very much for your assistance and quick resolution.
Closing the case now as the refund has been successfully completed and confirmed by the customer.
